description: Update an existing project transport event type.
permissions: Only records with a broker can be updated. User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker.
side_effects: Updates a project transport event type.
validation_notes: Event type ID argument is required. At least one of --code, --name, --dwell-minutes-min-default, or --transport-order-stop-role must be provided. Server requires code and name to be present for the record; do not clear them. code must not contain hyphens (-). code and name must be unique across global records and records for the broker. dwell-minutes-min-default must be numeric and >= 0. transport-order-stop-role must be one of: pickup, delivery (if provided).
